name: Creatures (itch)
description:
The Organisation hunts monsters. Each team got its own creatures expert...this time, it's you!

Made with Godot

Resources :

  • Monsters by Beowulf
  • Icon by dogchicken
  • Books, pages and animations by yd
  • Clues file by anjawbk
  • Page turning SFX by Nicole Marie T
  • Agents screams by bluszcz
  • Uechi Gothic font by David Rakowski
  • Elementary Gothic Bookhand font by Bill Roach
  • Askes Handwriting font by Aske Ching
  • Agents  animations by chasersgaming
  • Previous and next buttons  by Tempest in the Aether and Ryzom Core
  • Wood texture by JeremyWoods
  • GUI boxes by Karwisch

L'Organisation chasse les monstres. Chaque équipe comporte un expert en créatures...vous!

Fait avec Godot

  • Monstres par Beowulf
  • Logo par dogchicken
  • Livres, pages et animations par yd
